Doc followed on team 2's route, consulting his scanners. His
electronic sys=
tems were very advanced and allowed him to have a better
than normal grasp =
of what was going on on the battlefield. He saw that
  Perseus was getting =
closer to the Predacon.

Doc: Perseus! The pred's near you! 10 o'clock!

An=
d Dinobot was there. Not fighting or threatening, yet, but merely there.

D=
inobot: Finally! It [grunt] took you long enough!
